alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Swain (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 4:22PM EDT until August 12 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Swain County in western North Carolina... Northwestern Haywood County in western North Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dandridge to near Gatlinburg to 14 miles northwest of Bryson City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Cataloochee, Smoky Mountains-Big Creek, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, Cove Creek, Waterville, Fines Creek, Great Smoky Mountains National Park and Smoky Mountains-Oconaluftee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
